description: Retrieves the status of the graph database on the host. When invoking this operation in a Neptune cluster that has IAM authentication enabled, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows the neptune-db:GetEngineStatus IAM action in that cluster.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Set to healthy if the instance is not experiencing problems. If the instance is recovering from a crash or from being rebooted and there are active transactions running from the latest server shutdown, status is set to recovery.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: Set to the UTC time at which the current server process started.

nested_items.name: dbEngineVersion
nested_items.description: Set to the Neptune engine version running on your DB cluster. If this engine version has been manually patched since it was released, the version number is prefixed by Patch-.

nested_items.name: role
nested_items.description: Set to reader if the instance is a read-replica, or to writer if the instance is the primary instance.

nested_items.name: dfeQueryEngine
nested_items.description: Set to enabled if the DFE engine is fully enabled, or to viaQueryHint (the default) if the DFE engine is only used with queries that have the useDFE query hint set to true.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the query language.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the query language.

nested_items.name: opencypher
nested_items.description: Contains information about the openCypher query language available on your cluster. Specifically, it contains a version field that specifies the current operCypher version being used by the engine.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the query language.

nested_items.name: rollingBackTrxCount
nested_items.description: If there are transactions being rolled back, this field is set to the number of such transactions. If there are none, the field doesn't appear at all.

nested_items.name: rollingBackTrxEarliestStartTime
nested_items.description: Set to the start time of the earliest transaction being rolled back. If no transactions are being rolled back, the field doesn't appear at all.
